page.title: 09ST PATRICK'S JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: School starts at 9.15 and finishes at 3.30.The radiators, blackboards and desks are old fashioned.The library is old fashioned and there are hardly any good books. Our school is terrible and they are hoping to build a new one but it may be many years before the county council has enough money to pay for it. We have a BBC computer and we have just bought a video. At our school we dont get the cane. For punishment we get lines, we miss play time and if we are really bad we get hit with Mr. Youngs trainer.There is not really any rivalry in school and the atmosphere is quite good. Most people are quite friendly but sometimes the boys pick on the girls a bit. Recently there has been some stealing in school of money and a tractor. But really our school is all right. by Nicola Pitchford age 11.
